attributes.action: Allow the public to decide when they retire by scrapping state pensions
attributes.additional_details: With an aging population, the state will shift responsibility of pensions to the public. The pension cut from National Insurance will be scrapped and the public should have complete onus in saving for their later days, which will be released completely tax free when and however much the account holder feels is appropriate. Those brought up on state benefits will receive enough to get by on, through a post-65 benefit scheme.
